titleStmt.title: A prayer sayd in the kinges chappell in the tyme of hys graces sicknes, for the restauracion of his helth commaunded to be sayd there, by the right Honorable Erle of Bedford, and mete to be vsed of all the Kinges trew subiectes. Set forthe the. xix. day of Iune. M.D.LIII.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete at the sygne of the Rose Garland, by wyllyam Copland,

notesStmt.note: See "The Library", ser. 6, II, p. 59 (reproduction opposite p. 57).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
